title.rendered: Eldorado Stone Joins HomeSphere Network of Preferred Manufacturers

content.rendered: Eldorado Stone joined HomeSphere BRI on February 20, 2014, connecting “HomeSphere’s growing builder network to authentic, quality products and one of the largest distribution networks nationwide.” HomeSphere BRI will source Eldorado Stone on its site, linking the residential construction industry to the stone manufacturer’s wide selection of products and responsive customer service.

excerpt.rendered: Eldorado Stone joined HomeSphere BRI on February 20, 2014, connecting “HomeSphere’s growing builder network to authentic, quality products and one of the largest distribution networks nationwide.” HomeSphere BRI will source Eldorado Stone on its site, linking the residential construction industry to the stone manufacturer’s wide selection of products and responsive customer service.
